com.artemis.system

Class InterpolatingEntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.BaseEntitySystem
        • com.artemis.EntitySystem
          • com.artemis.system.InterpolatingEntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.artemis.EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener

    public abstract class InterpolatingEntitySystem
extends com.artemis.EntitySystem
    Implements EntitySystem to add mini2Dx's update/interpolate methods
